Dr, Kenneth D• Norberg, Page 2, January 26, 1959
This letter is sent also on behalf of NAEB President 1A illiam C . Harley
and the originators of the three grant requests which we have already
submitted, dated, respectively, November 21, November 24 and Novem¬
ber 25, over the signatures of then President Frank E* Schooley.

Harry J. Skornia
